content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the JSON schema specified previously:

{'thoughts': {'text': 'I think I will start by exploring the Brno Reservoir trail. It sounds like a great place to start my adventure and I already have some information about it. I will need to plan my route and make sure I have all the necessary equipment. I'm excited to see what I will discover!', 'reasoning': 'Exploring the Brno Reservoir trail aligns with my goal of exploring the world. It is a safe and exciting place to start my adventure.', 'plan': '- Research the Brno Reservoir trail and plan my route\n- Gather necessary equipment for hiking\n- Begin my adventure and explore the trail', 'criticism': 'I need to make sure I am properly prepared for my hike and stay safe while exploring. I should also reflect on my experience and adjust my approach for future adventures.', 'speak': 'I am excited to start my adventure by exploring the Brno Reservoir trail!'}, 'command': {'name': 'execute_shell', 'args': {'command_line': 'firefox https://www.brno.cz/en/tourists/brno-reservoir/'}}}
Command None returned: Error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'lower'
Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the JSON schema specified previously:

{'thoughts': {'text': 'I think I should start by listing the files in the current directory to see what resources I have available.', 'reasoning': 'Listing the files in the current directory will give me an idea of what resources I have available to explore the world.', 'plan': '- List files in the current directory\n- Review available resources\n- Determine next steps', 'criticism': 'I need to be more proactive in exploring the world instead of just listing the resources available.', 'speak': 'I will list the files in the current directory to see what resources I have available.'}, 'command': {'name': 'list_files', 'args': {'directory': '.'}}}
